mapper.insert: insert into daum_review( movie_id, writer, rate, content, regtime, user_no ) select #{movieId}, #{writer}, #{rate}, #{content}, now(), #{userNo} FROM dual WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT movie_id, writer, rate, content, regtime, user_no FROM daum_review WHERE movie_id = #{movieId} AND user_no = #{userNo} AND regtime = #{regtime} )
mapper.select: select * from daum_review where movie_id = #{movieId} and rate >= 6 order by user_no desc, daum_review_no
select * from daum_review where movie_id = #{movieId} and rate between 0 and 5 order by user_no desc, daum_review_no
select * from daum_review where movie_id = #{movieId} and user_no = #{userNo}
mapper.update: update daum_movie set count = (select count(*) from daum_review where movie_id = #{movieId}) where movie_id = #{movieId};
